TopicTitle: How Fast You Can Go Challenge

Articles.Content:
\*if this is not clear please tell me\*

The challenge is to see how fast you can go in Kerbin orbit before you get into excape velocity and loose orbit with Kerbin.

It must use Stock only parts and you can't use any of the cheats.

Post your hi-score below and maybe you will get Jebidiahs Swag of Approval ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I do think that this will always be almost the same, cause escape velocity is, well, a velocity. Maybe change the challenge to "how fast can you go before the craft itself gets out of the Kerbin system"?

ilovespiders, this challenge has already been made: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114312-Stock-Kerbin-Space-Speed-Record](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114312-Stock-Kerbin-Space-Speed-Record)!
Please review [the submission guidelines](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide) before posting challenges.
